nodes.text: Xim Week: The History of Xim and the Tion Cluster

Xim Week: The History of Xim and the Tion Cluster is a Hyperspace–exclusive article written by Jason Fry that was added to StarWars.com on December 7, 2009. It gives a history of Xim and the Tion Cluster. The article was later added to the Star Wars: The Essential Atlas Online Companion.
